messages.title: Local Engagement
messages.content: For nearly six years, I have spent most of my spare time dealing with residents' concerns and campaigning on local issues.

messages.title: Eastern Development Area Opposition
messages.content: I have been working closely with local campaigners to oppose the unwelcome Eastern Development Area proposal that threatens the identity and character of our local villages.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for the smaller parties risks more years of Labour.

housing.content: Oppose the unwelcome Eastern Development Area proposal that threatens the identity and character of our local villages.

leaflet.personalStatement: Please give me the chance to serve as your new MP, who will be your representative in Westminster, not Westminster's representative in South Swindon.
leaflet.additionalNotes: PS. Remember, polls are open on Thursday from 7am to 10pm. You do not need your polling card to vote.
